Project.shortdesc: The project will create a Shibboleth Identity-Provider (Origin) service for all academic and support staff (at each of seven partner institutions in the SHERPA-LEAP consortium) who are involved in controlled access to their respective institutional Eprints servers, and will implement modifications to their respective Eprints servers to enable them all as Shibboleth Resource-Providers (Targets).
Project.name: ShibboLEAP
